attributes.action: Stop funding to repaint raf plane red white and blue wasting tax players money.
attributes.additional_details: Stop funding for this vanity project and use it for nation and not feed Cummings and Johnsons egos.
attributes.background:
Cummings and Johnsons and rest of government want to waste our money during a national emergency on a vanity project.
Which money can be used for people in need.

rejection.details: By the time your petition was started, the plane had already been painted. It's not clear what action can be taken now.
